responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: how many hours of work in a week
responses: article 65: normal hours is 8 hours per day (48 hours per week), increased to 9 hours for commercial establishments(hotels, cafeterias, security), it can be reduced for health-hazardous and arduous work

patterns: how many breaks in a day
responses: article 66 : no person should go without break for more than 5 continous hours, total break should be minimum of one hour
any extra hours of work can be claimed as overtime, with a minimum of 25% of wage calculated as excess per hour
